Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Button
Description: Only the head and part of the fastening of this unfortunately damaged circular button, made of grey clay, remains. The diametre of this piece is 2,7 cm and the actual height of the button is 0,7 cm. The surface of the button bears a design of incised and interlaced lines, which suggest a floral pattern.
